item.title: Old Town Stories
item.description: Old Town Stories is a VR (Oculus Rift) shooter game made with Unreal Engine 4. Contribution “VR integration: The player’s Pawn VR related input and hand animations integration.” VR optimization : Making sure the project had a stable 90 fps was a challenge due to the realistic look of the game. Some of the optimizations were: making sure there were no transparencies, level-streaming, using as simple as posible materials, HLODs, static lights…" Magnetic Shield (gameplay): Shield which stops, accumulates and returns enemy bullets.
